Peter Schoeffman

developer

(Construction Ahead - Hard Hat required)

Hello

I'm a trained video game developer and a experienced web developer.
Living in Toronto, Ontario
Program by day, seek truth and justice by night.

About

Web Development

I've worked with many different platforms such as Rails and AEM. Recently I've had the opportunity to work with Angularjs.

Game Development

I keep up on Game Development when I'm not working on web apps. Be sure to check out my latest Unity projects.

Open source

I'm an advocate of open source ideas. Most of my knowedge was gained from open source projects and I hope to continue to contribute with the open source movement.

Philosophy

I try and live in balance and follow the mantra Positive, Knowledgeable and Wise. Linus Torvalds is one of my hero's and I strive to be more like him.

Experience

Web

thestar.ca

Built from a Adobe AudienceManager backend, The Star has both an AEM frontend, and a mobile Angular app. A model for other news agency The Star strives to remain on top of its technological game.

MyStar

The Star's user specific toolset was the first ruby application I laid my hands on. A step in the right direction, away from the high priest of a language known as Java.

The GridTo

A monumental challenge from a server performance level. The GridTo is where I cut my teeth with Varnish, and the services offered by AWS

Game

Unity

Using Unity 4.6 Beta I have completed a mini game Zombie shooter which you can check out here. The game is built in Unity from tools provided by the Unite conference to promote the learning of Unity. The Assets are provided as well as instructions on how to use the featres of Unity to tie it all togeather. I'm building on top of this game to help build my knowledge of the Unity Game Engine.

Capstone

Capstone was an action puzzle game I built by myself. You can check out a video of the gameplay here The game was built from the ground up with every vertex constructed by hand. I also ran all the physics through my custom game engine. Levels were templated out though xml and read in to allow for quick and easy level construction. A really fun project that I am extremly proud of.

Education

Humber

Game Programming

Advanced Diploma with Honours

Humber’s Game Programming diploma program is project-driven and focuses on the design and development of games. I created applications that apply theories of usability, information architecture, network architecture and industry standards of practice.

Sheridan

Media Fundamentals

Ontario College Cert. with Honours

The Sheridan Media Fundamentals program offers foundation curriculum in digital media, journalism and broadcasting. The focus of this program is to strengthen skills in Web and computer technology, Visual Design and Media history.
